about_the_game:
Wardens of the Rift is a cute and colourful roguelike tower defense deck-builder all about making use of chaotic synergies within a tactical battlefield. Build towers, cast spells and defeat bosses all while adapting to ever-changing terrain and procedurally generated maps.

  • DEFEND THE RIFT: Play hundreds of different cards while you fortify the battlefield, building mighty strongholds and insurmountable defenses!

  • DETER THE HORDE: Deploy custom strategy onto the map using utility towers - beat them up, slow them down or blow them into pieces!

  • DEFEAT BOSSES: Come head to head with dozens of unique bosses, morphing and changing your strategy as the frontline develops! Face ancient liches, grotesque trolls and eldritch horrors beyond your mortal comprehension!

  • PROTECT THE RIFT: With each run, make the battleground yours with endless procedurally generated possibilities!

Features

  • Procedurally Generated Maps: Adapt to unique and challenging maps, taking advantage of the terrain and biomes to optimise your defence.

  • Hundreds of Unique Cards: Hundreds of individual cards, from powerful defensive towers and support structures, to mind-bending spells and enchantments!

  • Cute and Colourful Art Style: Wage war on a vibrant and colourful environment

  • Strategic Deckbuilding: Upgrade your deck and acquire unique cards in between levels. Create synergies and manage your economy/resources.

Endless Replayability!

  • 60+ defensive and support towers

  • 30+ game-changing, tactical spells

  • 20+ distinctive enemies

  • 10+ unique bosses

  • 10+ economy / resource structures
